##Method 1 - Read table from R by using RMySQL package

``` {r}
library(RMySQL)
mydb = dbConnect(MySQL(),user='root',password='',dbname='flights',host='localhost')
movie_review = dbSendQuery(mydb,"select * from TB")
data.frame(fetch(movie_review))
```{r}
